main event: Several unidentified objects were observed over a period of four minutes by two employees of an oil company in Berlin, New Hampshire.
interesting points: The objects were first sighted to the north and later sighted to the northeast of the observers.
The objects were bluish-white in color.
The objects were observed for a total of four minutes.
Additional personnel also reported observing the sighting, but no further information was provided.
The sighting was thought to potentially be caused by flight into the area by northeast winds.
witnesses: two employees of an oil company
